author: PRNewswire
title: Jackery Unveils Revolutionary Green Energy Innovations at CES 2024: Introducing Solar Generator Mars Bot and Solar Generator for Rooftop Tent - Benzinga
text:
LAS VEGAS , Jan. 5, 2024 /PRNewswire/ -- Jackery , a global leader in innovative portable power and outdoor energy solutions, proudly announces its much-anticipated presence at the prestigious Consumer Electronics Show (CES) 2024. With great excitement, Jackery invites attendees to witness the debut of two groundbreaking products: the Solar Generator Mars Bot , the Jackery Solar Generator for Rooftop Tent and showcase of complete Plus series.
New Product Highlights:
The Solar Generator Mars Bot emerges as an epitome of sustainable technology, merging cutting-edge robotics with solar energy innovation. This futuristic outdoor companion redefines the boundaries of portable energy solutions, boasting an array of intelligent features designed to enhance outdoor experiences. Whether it's adventure, exploration, home back-up or rescue scenario, the Solar Generator Mars Bot promises to elevate every moment.
Additionally, the Jackery Solar Generator for Rooftop Tents marks a new era in off-grid living. Compact yet powerful, this innovative product harnesses solar energy efficiently, catering to essential power needs for outdoor enthusiasts. With seamless integration and reliability, it empowers individuals to embrace off-grid adventures without compromising on comfort or convenience.
Powerful Existing Product Line:
Jackery continues to push the boundaries of innovation with the showcase of the Plus series. This lineup includes the Solar Generator 2000 Plus, Solar Generator 1000 Plus, Solar Generator 300 Plus, and Explorer 100 Plus, representing a diverse range of portable power solutions with different capacity levels. These additions further solidify Jackery's commitment to providing versatile and reliable energy sources for a multitude of lifestyles and purposes.
Strength in Innovation and Legacy:
The introduction of these groundbreaking innovations underscores Jackery's unwavering dedication to pioneering portable power technology. As Jackery commemorated its 11th anniversary in 2023, it reflects on its journey of continuous evolution and innovation. From humble beginnings to becoming a global leader, Jackery remains steadfast in its mission to empower individuals and communities through accessible and sustainable energy solutions.
For an immersive experience and an exclusive preview of these revolutionary innovations, visit Jackery at Booth #9815, North Hall, LVCC, during CES 2024 from January 9 to 12 . Join us in embracing the future of portable power.
About Jackery:
Jackery, the world's leading innovative portable power and green outdoor energy solution provider founded in California in 2012, is a global top-selling solar generator brand born with a mission to offer green energy to everyone, everywhere. Jackery launched its first outdoor portable power stations in 2016 and developed its first portable solar panels in 2018. Jackery has sold over 3 million units globally since 2018, and has been recognized by over 200 authorized media and organizations worldwide and received 58 prestigious international design awards. Jackery has fulfilled its social responsibility on a global scale and maintained long-term cooperation with global public welfare organizations such as WWF, NFF and IRC contributing its strength and value to boost global sustainable development and other public welfare.
SOURCE Jackery Inc.

author: Ma.Cif.
title: Terrorismo: esaltava Jihad a attentati suicidi sui social, espulso egiziano
text: [Cronaca](/cronaca/) Terrorismo: esaltava Jihad e attentati suicidi sui social, espulso egiziano Moustafa Fetouh Ibrahim Matar √® stato rintracciato a Roma e allontanato dal Paese Inneggiava alla guerra santa ed esaltava gli attentati terroristici sui social network. Moustafa Fetouh Ibrahim Matar, cittadino egiziano di 31 anni, √® stato rintracciato a Roma ed espulso dall'Italia. Sono stati gli agenti di polizia, nella serata di gioved√¨, a dare esecuzione al provvedimento di espulsione dal territorio nazionale, adottato dal ministro dell‚ÄôInterno per motivi di sicurezza dello Stato, a carico del cittadino egiziano di 31 anni. Grazie alla sinergia tra la direzione centrale polizia di prevenzione, la direzione centrale dell'immigrazione e della polizia delle frontiere, la Digos di Roma e Modena, e l'ufficio immigrazione della questura capitolina l‚Äôuomo √® stato intercettato ed espulso. Dal Nord Italia il 31enne era infatti arrivato a Roma. Per diverso tempo l‚Äôufficio investigativo del ros dei carabinieri lo ha monitorato, anche su vari canali social, scoprendo che lo straniero propagandava lo stato islamico, esaltando il jihad e attentati suicidi, quali strumenti per stabilire la supremazia dell‚ÄôIslam. L‚Äôuomo √® stato espulso e rimpatriato.

author: Jes√∫s Castillo
title: Aguascalientes avanza en su consolidaci√≥n como el estado m√°s seguro del pa√≠s | MVS Noticias
text: Siguiendo la visi√≥n de la gobernadora Tere Jim√©nez, de preservar la paz y tranquilidad en Aguascalientes, a lo largo del 2023 la Secretar√≠a de Seguridad P√∫blica del Estado (SSPE) impuls√≥ acciones y programas enfocados a salvaguardar la seguridad y el bienestar de los ciudadanos, pero sobre todo, para posicionar al estado como el m√°s seguro del pa√≠s. Al respecto, el titular de la dependencia, Manuel Alonso Garc√≠a, destac√≥ que gracias al esfuerzo conjunto y coordinado entre los tres niveles de gobierno se fortaleci√≥ el blindaje del territorio estatal; asimismo, dijo que para promover un entorno seguro, este a√±o se trabaj√≥ en varios rubros que van desde el fortalecimiento de los recursos humanos hasta la implementaci√≥n de tecnolog√≠as de vanguardia. Referente a esto, mencion√≥ que entre tales acciones destaca la integraci√≥n de 200 nuevos polic√≠as, as√≠ como la homologaci√≥n salarial para las corporaciones estatal y municipales; tambi√©n se entregaron becas para que los hijos e hijas de polic√≠as estudien en las mejores universidades del estado, as√≠ como cr√©ditos para adquirir una vivienda digna, entre otros beneficios nunca antes vistos. Te podr√≠a interesar Alonso Garc√≠a coment√≥ que el liderazgo del C5i se consolid√≥ este a√±o a nivel nacional por su innovaci√≥n tecnol√≥gica y la respuesta oportuna a los reportes de emergencias, as√≠ como por la implementaci√≥n de protocolos en la atenci√≥n de llamadas mudas y personas desaparecidas, con lo que se coloc√≥ como el mejor del pa√≠s. Te podr√≠a interesar Destac√≥ que en respuesta a las solicitudes de los propios habitantes de los municipios de Calvillo y Asientos, se construyeron dos puertas de seguridad en dichas demarcaciones, acciones clave para fortalecer la confianza de la ciudadan√≠a y hacer de Aguascalientes el lugar m√°s seguro del pa√≠s. Por otro lado, el helic√≥ptero Fuerza 1 realiz√≥ m√°s de 113 vuelos preventivos y nueve traslados de √≥rganos que dieron esperanza de vida a otras personas; tambi√©n se adquirieron m√°s de 100 nuevas patrullas y se instalaron c√°maras de videovigilancia. De igual manera, se cre√≥ la Universidad de la Polic√≠a y Ciencias de la Seguridad de Aguascalientes (Unpol), donde se implement√≥ la Licenciatura en Seguridad P√∫blica y Ciencias Policiales, lo que representa un gran paso hacia la formaci√≥n integral de las y los polic√≠as. Adicionalmente se crearon unidades especializadas, como la Polic√≠a Rosa y la Unidad de Polic√≠a de Atenci√≥n a las Infancias; el Programa 4x4 se integr√≥ con m√°s de mil 190 comit√©s instalados en todo el estado, gracias a lo cual se registr√≥ una disminuci√≥n de m√°s del 20 por ciento en la incidencia delictiva. El programa ‚ÄúMujeres de 10‚Äù y la instalaci√≥n de seis Casas Rosas en el estado son iniciativas interinstitucionales significativas para el desarrollo integral de las ni√±as, mujeres y adultas mayores; mientras que mediante el programa ‚ÄúEscuelas Ciberseguras‚Äù se atendieron m√°s de 5 mil reportes de ciberdelitos y violencia digital. En el √°mbito de la investigaci√≥n criminal y seguridad jur√≠dica, el titular de la SSPE inform√≥ que se cre√≥ la Agencia Estatal de Investigaci√≥n Criminal y se implement√≥ la plataforma Casiopea, a trav√©s de la cual se recibieron y atendieron m√°s de 480 denuncias digitales. Finalmente, coment√≥ que la innovaci√≥n institucional ha sido evidente en la certificaci√≥n de los polic√≠as, el refuerzo de unidades especiales y la creaci√≥n de la Polic√≠a Estatal de Carreteras, Tur√≠stica y Metropolitana, con lo que se demuestra el compromiso por garantizar la seguridad y la eficacia en la prevenci√≥n del delito. ‚ÄúCada acci√≥n y logro de la Secretar√≠a de Seguridad P√∫blica del Estado durante el 2023 refleja el firme compromiso que tenemos con la seguridad y el bienestar de todos; estos logros son un paso importante para lograr que Aguascalientes se consolide como el estado m√°s seguro del pa√≠s‚Äù, concluy√≥.

author: EP
title: Un ataque armado en Nigeria deja al menos trece muertos
text:
Violencia
Un ataque armado en Nigeria deja al menos trece muertos
EP
Al menos trece personas han
[muerto](/tags/muerte/) en un ataque perpetrado por parte de hombres armados en la comunidad Anguwan Mai-Giro, que se encuentra entre las localidades de Rafi y Shiro, en el estado nigeriano de N√≠ger, en el centro del pa√≠s africano.
El ataque, que tuvo lugar el mi√©rcoles por la noche, ha sido condenado por el gobernador en funciones de N√≠ger, Yajubu Garba, quien ha descrito los hechos como "sat√°nicos, insensibles y atroces". "Es muy desalentador y perturbador que otros seres humanos lleven a cabo un
[acto tan b√°rbaro y cruel](/tags/violencia/)", reza un comunicado.
El gobernador ha reafirmado "la determinaci√≥n y compromiso inquebrantables" de "controlar la ola de inseguridad en el Estado", mientras que ha alentado a las fuerzas de seguridad a "no desanimarse por los ataques a las comunidades", asegur√°ndoles "todo el apoyo".
El noreste de
[Nigeria](/tags/nigeria/) es el epicentro de las actividades de Boko Haram y su escisi√≥n, Estado Isl√°mico en √Åfrica Occidental (ISWA), si bien la inseguridad se ha extendido a otras zonas del centro, el norte y el noroeste, haciendo saltar las alarmas sobre la posible expansi√≥n de estas redes terroristas y criminales. El Real Madrid ya es un polvor√≠n Vitor Roque se marcha cedido al Betis ¬øPor qu√© la Juventus deja salir a Chiesa 'low cost'? Oferta de 10 millones por Chiesa Decepci√≥n en el Real Madrid con Rodrygo El Bar√ßa lo tiene muy claro con Pablo Torre Chiesa da el OK para fichar por el Bar√ßa Marc Pubill, opci√≥n para el lateral derecho del Bar√ßa

author: Samuel
title: You Are A Testament Of The Goodness Of God ‚Äì Juliana Olayode Celebrates Funke Akindele
text:
Home Contact Us [Tip Us: [email protected]]https://www.tori.ng/#
Juliana Olayode, the Nollywood actress, has celebrated her senior colleague and boss and veteran Nollywood star, Funke Akindele, appreciating God for her life.
Sharing a clip from Funke Akindele‚Äòs Praise Concert on her Instagram page, she said that the actress‚Äô life is a testimonial to great grace, his favour, and mercy.
Juliana conveyed her gratitude to God for all that He has done for her, including the progress He has made in Funke‚Äôs life.
Offering up a prayer on her behalf, she continued by saying that she is constantly reminded that all praise and honour must go to God.
In her words: ‚ÄúThere are many ways to the heart of God, THANKSGIVING is one of them. Two days ago we gathered for #FAANpraisefiesta it was a beautiful time well spent praising God. Mama @funkejenifaakindele your life is a testament to GREAT GRACE, a testament of the goodness of God, the favor of God, the mercy of God, and the hand of God. I celebrate God over your life.
‚ÄúI am so happy about the many things God has done for you/ how far He has brought you, and many more things He will do for you, because He is not done. It will only get better!!!!
‚ÄúAgain, I was reminded that in all that we do, we must always give honor to whom honor is due and return all the accolades to the one who truly owns it, to God!!!! FAAN praise fiesta was looking forward to the next one.‚Äù
Watch the video below:

author: Melih Altƒ±nok
title: Global corporations versus nation-states
text: In today‚Äôs interconnected world, the influence of monopolistic corporations has grown to staggering levels, especially through global communication channels. These corporate giants can now sway public opinion and mobilize the masses, often with alarming ease, by leveraging the widespread addiction to digital devices. Elon Musk, who famously invested $44 billion in acquiring Twitter (now rebranded as X), exemplifies the audacity of these corporate titans. His frequent clashes with governments, including his public advocacy for a coup in Venezuela, stem from this newfound confidence. Recently, Musk has found himself at odds with the United Kingdom, further highlighting the growing friction between corporate power and state sovereignty. Keir Starmer, the new Labour Prime Minister of the U.K., has pointed to social media platforms like X as a catalyst for the recent wave of racist street protests plaguing the nation. His concerns are not unfounded. Following the tragic knife attack in Southport on July 29, where a 17-year-old assailant killed three children and injured 10 others, including eight children, social media became a breeding ground for misinformation. Rumors quickly spread that the attacker was both an immigrant and a Muslim. This false narrative sparked widespread violence, with mosques burned, the homes of Muslims and immigrants raided, and businesses looted. Even after it was confirmed that the attacker was a Christian, the unrest continued to escalate, fueled by the unchecked spread of inflammatory content on social media. Musk‚Äôs X, under the guise of "freedom of expression," allowed the dissemination of these unverified claims. Musk himself exacerbated the situation by commenting, "Civil war is inevitable," in a video of the riots in Liverpool. While Musk‚Äôs motivations for meddling in Venezuela are transparently tied to the country‚Äôs lithium reserves ‚Äì essential for his electric car empire, his dispute with the U.K. raises new questions. Could the battle for lithium be at the heart of this conflict as well? Serbia, a nation whose past is marked by triggering global conflicts such as World War II, now finds itself on the brink of domestic upheaval. The streets are alive with mass protests against the planned opening of lithium mines. President Aleksandar Vucic, who recently warned of an imminent "big conflict," claims to have received intelligence from Russia suggesting that a Western-backed coup may be in the works. Vucic, one of Russian President Vladimir Putin‚Äôs closest allies, has been navigating a precarious geopolitical landscape. At a recent news conference with Chinese President Xi Jinping, Vucic highlighted China‚Äôs growing investment in Serbia for the last three years in particular, declaring that, "Serbia's defense is more reliable today with China's support." However, Vucic‚Äôs balancing act has not gone unnoticed. Just last month, he met with German Chancellor Olaf Scholz in Belgrade, where they signed a strategic memorandum of understanding on raw materials, electric vehicles and battery production. Notably, the British control the mine that will supply lithium to both China and Germany, with the European Union also playing a role. Reports even suggest that environmental concerns have been strategically downplayed to push the project forward. The unrest in Serbia could well be a signal from Moscow, displeased with Vucic‚Äôs increasingly Western-oriented diplomacy. Yet, what stands out is the conspicuous absence of the United States in this consortium. Or perhaps, more accurately, the absence of Elon Musk, who has been aggressively pursuing lithium globally. The rise of electric vehicles has driven a surge in demand for essential minerals like lithium, nickel and cobalt, all crucial components of EV batteries. By 2030, it is expected that around 60% of vehicles in China, Europe and the United States will be electric. The International Energy Agency (IEA) predicts that by 2040, the demand for lithium could increase 40-fold compared to 2020 levels. Currently, China dominates the global market in lithium processing and battery production, but this supply chain is vulnerable. If new lithium sources are not tapped, the entire market could face a severe shortfall. Musk, often lauded for his efforts to champion ‚Äúfree speech‚Äù on X, is clearly intoxicated by the vast opportunities presented by the global lithium race. If he, with all his wealth and power, is so consumed by this pursuit, one can only imagine the lengths to which other global media magnates might go to secure their share.

author: Alex Ford
title: Pop It For Pardi: Boo‚Äôd Up Baddie Gyal Jada Kingdom Claps Her Copious Caribbean Cakes In Viral Video, Sets Off Thunderous Twerk Winds
text: Well, hello there, Jada Kingdom Social media is buzzing over [Pardison Fontaine](https://bossip.com/2566100/megan-thee-stallion-slams-pardi-pardison-fontaine/)‚Äòs thicccc new gyalfriend [Jada Kingdom](https://bossip.com/2530048/jada-kingdom-pardi-megan-thee-stallion/) clapping her copious Caribbean cakes in a now-viral video that sent fans into a frenzy on New Year‚Äôs Day. Oh yes, she‚Äôs quite the generational TALENT who set off strong gusts of twerk wind across social media. ‚Äî Rasheed Sunflower „ÉÑ (@AoCIzzy) [January 2, 2024] As [previously reported](https://bossip.com/2528507/megan-thee-stallion-accuses-pardison-fontaine-of-cheating/), the Jamaican baddie trended after being accused of slithering into [Megan Thee Stallion](https://bossip.com/2528386/fans-react-megan-thee-stallion-ex-pardison-fontaine-allegedly-cheating-new-single-cobra/)‚Äòs bed with [Pardison Fontaine](https://bossip.com/2528507/megan-thee-stallion-accuses-pardison-fontaine-of-cheating/). Megan spilled the tea in her latest single ‚ÄúCobra‚Äù where she revealed that she went through a bad breakup caused by infidelity. The Hot Girl rapped, ‚ÄúPulled up, caught him cheating, getting his d**k sucked in the same spot I‚Äôm sleeping/ Lord, give me a break, I don‚Äôt know how much more of this s**t I can take.‚Äù Naturally, fans assumed the lyrics were about her ex-boo [Pardison Fontaine](https://bossip.com/2528386/fans-react-megan-thee-stallion-ex-pardison-fontaine-allegedly-cheating-new-single-cobra/) and his current girlfriend Jada Kingdom who posted a photo of flowers she received from Pardi coincidentally on the same day that ‚ÄúCobra‚Äù dropped. It looks like Jada Kingdom received this beautiful floral arrangement from a special someone!! [pic.twitter.com/hQMsaIZdQa] ‚Äî TheShadeRoom (@TheShadeRoom) [November 3, 2023] ‚ÄúIt better not have been u in that bed üò≠,‚Äù wrote one fan. ‚ÄúWhyyy do they always cheat with the most UNSUCCESSFUL, UNCOORDINATED, UNGODLY, UNCIVILIZED girls!‚Äù added another. On Twitter, the accusations continued. I see why Pardi cheated on Megan w/ this Jada Kingdom gal cus this is generational cheating material‚Ä¶ [pic.twitter.com/3A5mORVbvN] ‚Äî Van (@vanman_1000) [November 4, 2023] The Kingston native eventually [broke her silence](https://www.tmz.com/2023/11/03/megan-thee-stallion-cobra-lyrics-pardison-fontaine-jada-kingdom/(?adid=partner-bossip)) with some shade towards the Hotties and ‚Äútheir President‚Äù Megan Thee Stallion, ‚ÄúSooo I guess I knew the lyrics before it dropped? Right and I decided to post my flowers 8 hours before as a ‚Äúhint hint it‚Äôs me guys‚Äù HUH???? why??? the internet is a special place. I know it‚Äôs gonna drive y‚Äôall crazy not to have someone specific to terrorize for y‚Äôall president but it wasn‚Äôt me,‚Äù she wrote on her Instagram Stories. She continued, ‚ÄúDon‚Äôt insert me in sh*t that got NOTHING to do with me, How did the math equal ME?! Plus dat sh*t dumb as f*ck!‚Äù As for her new man, her man, her man Pardison Fontaine, well, he continued to get dragged in his comment section on social media with one fan most recently writing, ‚ÄúGetting a ‚ÄúFEMINIST‚Äù tattoo then cheating on a woman at her lowest point is WILD.‚Äù Do you think Jada Kingdom is the next big Jamaican artist? Tell us down below and peep the social media hysteria over her cake-clapping prowess on the flip. ‚Äî Rasheed Sunflower „ÉÑ (@AoCIzzy) [January 2, 2024] Still thinking about that Jada kingdom video üòÆüí® [pic.twitter.com/6thXsXCvkL] ‚Äî ‚òÜ (@shanicalspink) [January 3, 2024] going from megan the stallion to jada kingdom is sumn that‚Äôs supposed to happened to the nigga that cure cancer, end world hunger, or me! not a nigga like pardi wtf ‚Äî Old Man Tinkus üë¥üèæ (@MrThugChip) [January 2, 2024] Every day I wake up I get mad cause Jada Kingdom being with Pardi smh [pic.twitter.com/DIBjkfcC7u] ‚Äî MamaBearüß∏ (@xococogalore) [January 3, 2024] Me when I saw that Pardi & Jada video [pic.twitter.com/Fhn8FzZZWk] ‚Äî ùêÑùê±ùêöùêØùê¢ùêûùê´ ùêèùê®ùê©ùêû (@exavierpope) [January 3, 2024] Jada Kingdom over there with Pardi when she should be with me [pic.twitter.com/d5kgqbC048] ‚Äî Sunshine. üö© (@JLaCocaina) [January 2, 2024] Continue Slideshow Pardi ain‚Äôt have to be a good nigga at all & has dated Meg thee Stallion & Jada Kingdom Idk what the moral to the story is no more I haven‚Äôt prayed for many ppls downfalls but that might be where I‚Äôm at [pic.twitter.com/tAUYudX6AE] ‚Äî Nigerian Giant (@SheWantsTheVic) [January 3, 2024] - Bad & Boujee: Our Hollywood Faves Dripped Decadently For The Academy Museum Gala - Balenci Bardi: Cardi B Makes Her Debut On The Catwalk For Balenciaga Fall '24 Show - Destiny's Child Reunites & Celebs 'Alien Superstar' Slay At Beyonc√©'s 'Renaissance' Film World Premiere - So Stunning: Keke Palmer, Janelle Mon√°e, Tamar Braxton, Coco Jones, & More Attend 2023 BET Soul Train Awards - Fashion Icon Honoree Serena Williams Takes Center Stage At The 2023 CFDA Awards - 'Fashion Killa' Writer Sowmya Krishnamurthy Talks Lil Kim's Style Influence And The KanYe Interview That Did Not Happen - Who Wins The Jollof Wars?
